org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api

Class AbstractSingleGateRecordReader<T extends IOReadableWritable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.AbstractRecordReader
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.AbstractSingleGateRecordReader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the record that can be read from this record reader.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReaderBase
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutableRecordReader, RecordReader

    public abstract class AbstractSingleGateRecordReader<T extends IOReadableWritable>
extends AbstractRecordReader
    This is an abstract base class for a record reader, either dealing with mutable or immutable records.

      • publishEvent

        public void publishEvent(AbstractTaskEvent event)
                  throws IOException,
                         InterruptedException
        Publishes an event.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be published
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurs while transmitting the event
        InterruptedException - thrown if the thread is interrupted while waiting for the event to be published
